isis.stitle: 9 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT-8609 SERIES - CHANGING THE INPUT SHAFT - DISASSEMBLY

step1.para: Remove the gear shift lever housing assembly (or remote control assembly) from the shifter housing, and the shifter housing assembly from the transmission case.
Remove the front bearing cover and gasket. If necessary, remove the O-ring from the cover of models so equipped.
Remove the bearing retaining snap ring from the groove in the shaft.

Push down on the input shaft to cock the bearing in the bore. Drive the input shaft toward the rear of the transmission, through the bearing as far as possible. Pull the input shaft forward to expose the snap ring of the bearing.
Use pry bars to complete the removal of the bearing.
Remove the drive gear spacer and snap ring.
Pull the input shaft forward and out of the drive gear and case.
